text: Castiadas (Castiàdas) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 1,669 people lived there. Its area is 103.89 km². It is 60 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Castiadas
